QuestData.Title: Consumed by Hatred
QuestData.Description: They murdered my wife. They burned my homestead. Since that awful night I have traveled these lands, from the sun's rising till its decline, scouring the horizon for more of those monsters. I've killed every pig man I've come across since, but my thirst for their blood is far from quenched.$B$BYou, $c - you could help me.$B$BKill them. Kill as many as you can. Bring me their tusks, and we will celebrate their deaths together.
QuestData.CompletionText: The quilboar will pay for this, $n. I swear it.
QuestData.RewardText: $C, you take my task seriously, and for that I thank you.$B$BAlthough my desire for revenge remains, I can at least smile seeing that the quilboars have felt pain themselves.
